name: Edge Imp Retrofit
text:
You can only use this Skill's second and third effects once per turn.
1: You cannot Special Summon (excluding Special Summons from the Extra Deck and your opponent's Graveyard) monsters, except for "Frightfur", "Fluffal", and "Edge Imp" monsters.
2: Shuffle 1 "Edge Imp" monster from your hand or face-up field into the Deck, and add 1 "Edge Imp" monster from your Deck to your hand.
3: During your Main Phase, equip 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field to 1 "Frightfur Bear" on your field, as if it were equipped by the effect of "Frightfur Bear".
